item.title: Hatsune Miku to Appear in Shinkansen Henkei Robo Shinkalion the Animation!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
A surprise tweet from the Shinkansen Henkei Robo Shinkalion the Animation‘s (hereafter “Shinkalion“) official Twitter account has revealed something that is sure to excite fans of Hatsune Miku: 【！情報解禁！】 あの「初音ミク」がシンカリオンの運転士としてアニメに登場することに！！詳しくは公式HPをチェック！https://t.co/2L14PdRaH3#シンカリオン #初音ミク pic.twitter.com/MBxngsjhP8 — 新幹線変形ロボ シンカリオン (@shinkalion) December 27, 2017 【！News Reveal！】 A certain “Hatsune Miku” will be making her debut as a Shinkalion pilot in …

The post Hatsune Miku to Appear in Shinkansen Henkei Robo Shinkalion the Animation! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A surprise tweet from the Shinkansen Henkei Robo Shinkalion the Animation‘s (hereafter “Shinkalion“) official Twitter account has revealed something that is sure to excite fans of Hatsune Miku:

【！情報解禁！】

あの「初音ミク」がシンカリオンの運転士としてアニメに登場することに！！
詳しくは公式HPをチェック！https://t.co/2L14PdRaH3#シンカリオン #初音ミク pic.twitter.com/MBxngsjhP8

— 新幹線変形ロボ シンカリオン (@shinkalion) December 27, 2017

【！News Reveal！】 A certain “Hatsune Miku” will be making her debut as a Shinkalion pilot in our anime series! See our official homepage for details!
http://www.shinkalion.com/news/222/
#シンカリオン #初音ミク

The tweet confirms that Miku will be appearing in the Shinkalion anime series early next year!

About Shinkalion

Shinkalion started out as a toy franchise from Takara Tomy in which various real-life shinkansen bullet trains can transform into fighting robots to protect the world. On January 6th, 2018, the anime adaption of the toy line from OLM Inc. will begin airing on TBS.

One of the trains/robots that will be featured in the series is the E5 Hayabusa.

About Hatsune Miku’s Appearance in the Anime

According to Shinkalion‘s official site and press release, Miku will be appearing as a stoic 11-year-old girl named Hatsune Miku (name written as 発音ミク as opposed to 初音ミク, but pronounced the same way) who aspires to become a Shinkalion pilot. Hatsune Miku hails from the Super Advanced Research Center, Hokkaido Branch, is great at both studying and kendo, and loves going to the Hakodate City Seikan Ferry Memorial Ship Mashu-Maru. She will piloting the Shinkalion H5 Hayabusa, and will serve as a rival to the show’s main character, Hayato Hayasugi.

Beyond that, details are still scarce. Who Hatsune Miku will be voiced by, which episode(s) she will appear in, and whether she will be part of the regular cast or just a one-time cameo character are all still unknown. However, fans will not have to wait long to find out, as the anime is set to premiere next Saturday, January 6th!

Information Source

Shinkalion Official Twitter
Shinkalion Official Site
Shinkalion Official Facebook
ASCII.jp

The post Hatsune Miku to Appear in Shinkansen Henkei Robo Shinkalion the Animation! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku Appears in an Episode of “Aware! Meisaku-kun!”
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
Readers may recall how we previously reported on Hatsune Miku singing the ending theme to the anime series Aware! Meisaku-kun. But on the October 20th episode of the anime, Miku did more than just sing at the end; she actually appears in the episode itself, which can now be watched on YouTube! In episode 63 …

The post Hatsune Miku Appears in an Episode of “Aware! Meisaku-kun!” appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Readers may recall how we previously reported on Hatsune Miku singing the ending theme to the anime series Aware! Meisaku-kun. But on the October 20th episode of the anime, Miku did more than just sing at the end; she actually appears in the episode itself, which can now be watched on YouTube!

In episode 63 of the comedy short, Miku appears in Meisaku-kun’s world to make everyone there “do the Mikku Miku.” For years, fans have always wondered exactly what that entails, but seeing how it apparently involves eye lasers, it may or may not be what you expect. Either way, this marks the first time in about nine years since Miku has made an official appearance in an anime series!

今日の「あはれ！名作くん」に初音ミクがゲスト出演してくれるのです〜！ただでさえ天使のミクさんが「名作くん」ワールドをみっくみくに染め上げるです。18時20分からのNHK Eテレ「ビットワールド」を見逃すな！ #名作くんhttps://t.co/O5C5WJ9m1i pic.twitter.com/gMxtPOQQiF

— むすび（あはれ！名作くん 公式） (@aware_meisaku) October 20, 2017

Today on “Aware! Meisaku-kun,” Hatsune Miku makes a special guest appearance! The angelic Miku-san comes to color the world of Meisaku-kun in Mikku Miku! Don’t miss the episode on NHK’s ETV program “BITWORLD” tonight at 6:20! #名作くん http://blog.piapro.net/2017/10/p1710191-1.html

While Miku has made cameos in other series such as Sayonara, Zetsubou-sensei and Lucky☆Star before, this episode of Aware! Meisaku-kun features the digital diva far more prominently than any other anime series has done before. In fact, even before the episode’s airing, Crypton’s Wataru Sasaki was quick to take to Twitter in order to dispel any notions that her portrayal in the anime should be taken as official or affect the public’s image of her.

『あはれ名作くん』は、コメディ／パロディ路線の脚本で1話限りのゲストなので、初音ミクの一般イメージに影響しないと考えています。初音ミクが明らかにデフォルメされていれば大丈夫だろうという認識です。なお、現在、もう1件アニメの客演の調整をしています。

— crypton_wat (@vocaloid_cv_cfm) October 19, 2017

Since Hatsune Miku is just appearing in a single comedy/parody episode of “Aware! Meisaku-kun,” I don’t think this will have any effect on her general image. As long as she appears super-deformed in any way, it should be recognized as unofficial. Furthermore, we’re currently arranging for her guest appearance in yet another anime.

In the same tweet, he even teases about another possible anime appearance for Miku!

Stay tuned to VNN for any news of Miku’s future appearances in anime and other media!

Information Source

HATSUNE MIKU Official Blog
Aware! Meisaku-kun‘s Official Twitter
Aware! Meisaku-kun‘s Official YouTube Channel

The post Hatsune Miku Appears in an Episode of “Aware! Meisaku-kun!” appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Zunda Horizon” Kickstarter Includes English Subs Goal!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
While a previous crowdfunding effort was announced last month, there’s now a special English language crowdfunding effort for Zunda Horizon as well! The Zunda Horizon Kickstarter is extra special, as one of its goals includes English subtitles! If the campaign succeeds, fans will have an English subbed version of Zunda Horizon! What is Zunda Horizon? …

The post “Zunda Horizon” Kickstarter Includes English Subs Goal! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
While a previous crowdfunding effort was announced last month, there’s now a special English language crowdfunding effort for Zunda Horizon as well! The Zunda Horizon Kickstarter is extra special, as one of its goals includes English subtitles! If the campaign succeeds, fans will have an English subbed version of Zunda Horizon!

What is Zunda Horizon?

Zunda Horizon is a 30-minute anime produced as a joint effort between Wao! World, Studio Live, and Zunko’s promotional company SSS LLC. Part of a four-series lineup of the “Anime Tamago 2017” project, it is the first anime musical that incorporates singing synthesis software such as VOCALOID and UTAU. The AH-Software VOCALOID and Zunda Horizon’s main character, Tohoku Zunko, sings using her VOCALOID software, while the rest of the cast sings using UTAU.

If you haven’t seen Zunda Horizon yet, there are official videos available on YouTube and niconico. However, you need to be quick! They won’t be up for much longer.

Goals

English Subs: $10,000 USD

Two More Episodes: $250,000 USD

Reward Tiers

Note: These descriptions are directly from the Kickstarter page.

$5 or More: View Our Treasured Materials
・Receive secret setting material
Note: If this is the same as the Japanese crowdfunding, these are downloads of the anime’s concept art.

$50 or More: Watch Our Animation
・Receive the current version of Zunda Horizon as digital data
・Receive Zunda Horizon 5.1ch version data as digital data
・Download script and storyboard data
・Receive secret setting material

$300 or More: One-of-a-kind Material
・Receive two in-between illustrations (in-between illustrations used in Zunda Horizon [illustrations that go between original pictures to create motion]).
・Blu-ray of Zunda Horizon
・Your name on the additional credits roll
・Receive the current version of Zunda Horizon as digital data
・Receive Zunda Horizon 5.1ch version data as digital data
・Download data of the script and storyboard
・Receive secret setting material

$300 or More: Special Animation Data

・Receive the in-between illustration data and more as data (approx. 14,000 files)
・Receive the original picture data for Zunda Horizon

$500 or More: Blu-ray with Director’s Signature

・Blu-ray with director’s signature
・Everything in the “One-of-a-kind Material” course

Limited to 50 people

$700 of More: Lots of One-of-a-kind Material
・Receive 10 in-between illustrations (in-between illustrations used in Zunda Horizon [illustrations that go between original pictures to create motion]).
・Course “Blu-ray with Director’s Signature”

$1,000 or More: Hand-drawn Card Illustration

・Receive an additional hand-drawn end card (framed) used in the credits roll, drawn by the animation director and character designer, Risa Suzuki.
・Course “Lots of One-of-a-kind Material”

Limited to 1 Person

Where to Donate

You can donate to the Zunda Horizon Kickstarter here. The project will only be funded if it reaches its goal by Tuesday, June 27, 2017, at 10:59 AM EDT, so be sure to donate while you can!

The post “Zunda Horizon” Kickstarter Includes English Subs Goal! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Two More “Zunda Horizon” Character Voice Banks Released!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
Last week, the first batch of UTAU voice banks used for the characters in the anime Zunda Horizon were made available for public download and use. This week, two more voice banks have been released, getting fans ever closer to having access to the voices of the entire cast! Hokkaido Meron Voice Provider: Ayaka Shimizu …

The post Two More “Zunda Horizon” Character Voice Banks Released! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Last week, the first batch of UTAU voice banks used for the characters in the anime Zunda Horizon were made available for public download and use. This week, two more voice banks have been released, getting fans ever closer to having access to the voices of the entire cast!

Hokkaido Meron

Voice Provider: Ayaka Shimizu

The school doctor at Furusato Girls Academy. She also makes Hokkaido-style snacks and confectioneries.

Hobbies: She has an insatiable foot fetish. She also enjoys tooling and tinkering, but has the faults of a speed maniac who focuses too much on velocity.

Abilities: Her helmet, which she calls the “Masked Mask,” has the ability to heighten the senses of its wearer. She can also infatuate and spellbind other people with the pheromones that she emits from her hair. However, when she’s wearing her Masked Mask, those pheromones end up spellbinding her, releasing her from the restraints of sense and reason instead.

Aspirations: Growing the snack industry in Hokkaido. That, and indulging herself in Zunko’s feet.

Download Hokkaido Meron’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: Caparo Ulula

Okinawa Awamo

Voice Provider: Aoi Koga

A first-year middle school student at Furusato Girls Academy. An untamed and free-wheeling lone-wolf type, though out of all the characters in Zunda Horizon, she is actually the most intelligent. Also possesses a rather foul mouth.

Hobbies: Always eagerly awaiting the next big event. When she gets tired of waiting, she’ll make the next big event herself. She also loves fishing.

Abilities: Her harpoon, which she calls the “Awa-mori” (mori or 銛 meaning “harpoon,” in this case), has the power to enhance the instinctive abilities of its bearer. She can also get drunk on sugar water and enter a drunken fighter state.

Aspirations: To live freely, as if carried off by the will of the wind.

Download Okinawa Awamo’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: higeoex

Demo Song #1: “From the Darkness”

Music, Lyrics, & Arrangement: higeoex

Demo Song #2: “Tenkiame”

Music: のーねーむ (No Name)
Photo: 黒井心 (Shin Kuroi)

There are still more Zunda Horizon characters whose voices banks haven’t been released yet, so stay tuned to VNN for updates on them!

Official Links

Tohoku Zunko Character Voice Page

Zunda Horizon Crowdfunding Page

The post Two More “Zunda Horizon” Character Voice Banks Released! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: UTAU Voice Banks for “Zunda Horizon” Characters Released!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
Zunda Horizon is the first-ever anime musical to use voice synths for all of its musical numbers. For instance, the main character, Tohoku Zunko, uses her actual VOCALOID voice bank to sing throughout the whole film! And she’s not the only one; every character who appears in Zunda Horizon has an UTAU voice bank, seven …

The post UTAU Voice Banks for “Zunda Horizon” Characters Released! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Zunda Horizon is the first-ever anime musical to use voice synths for all of its musical numbers. For instance, the main character, Tohoku Zunko, uses her actual VOCALOID voice bank to sing throughout the whole film! And she’s not the only one; every character who appears in Zunda Horizon has an UTAU voice bank, seven of which are now available for the general public to download and use!

Zundamon

Voice Provider: Yuina Ito

A zunda mochi sprite, capable of transforming into Zunko’s “Zunda Arrow.” Also carries a somewhat unlucky attribute, and often goes under everyone’s radar.

Hobbies: Just about anything involving zunda mochi.
Abilities: Transforming into the “Zunda Arrow.”
Aspirations: Popularizing zunda mochi, and also becoming a little more articulate at speaking.

Download Zundamon’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: higeoex
Demo Song: “スイートグリーン (Sweet Green)”
Lyrics, Music, & Arrangement: higeoex

Shikoku Metan

Voice Provider: Koyuki Tanaka

A second-year high school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Zunko’s classmate, constantly low on money and having to sleep outdoors.

Hobbies: Sulking in her teenage moodiness, though strangely skilled at writing furigana.
Abilities: Able to transfer methane hydrate warmth into any living organism (including humans) by kissing them. She’s also skilled at controlling her own body temperature, and won’t sweat on even the hottest of days. Her cherished white Lolita outfit never gets dirty.
Aspirations: Reviving the Shikoku clan, who can harness the power of methane hydrate.

Download Shikoku Metan’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: Caparo Ulula

Kyushu Sora mk=II

Voice Provider: Nozomi Nishida

A second-year high school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Zunko’s classmate and an android who was developed for space exploration.

Hobbies: Observing humans, for she was only recently created and finds anything and everything fascinating.
Abilities: Able to function on solar power alone. She comes equipped with standard audio and video recording capabilities, and can make herself float as if in zero gravity. About 700 of her units have been mass-produced, whom she is constantly syncing up with. However, she hates getting water or sand stuck in her joints.
Aspirations: Collecting data on all the mysteries of space.

Download Kyushu Sora mk=II’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: デルタ＠きみがため (delta/Kimi ga Tame)

Chugoku Usagi

Voice Provider: Rika Momokawa

A second-year high school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Zunko’s classmate and a shrine maiden from Izumo. She once skipped a grade, and is actually 14-years-old.

Hobbies: None. She was raised under the strict upbringing for a shrine maiden.
Abilities: Just by looking at someone, she can reduce the clothes on their backs to nothing but a pile of sand. It’s a very potent power, but she’s able to keep herself in check by playing with her stuffed rabbit named Inaba.
Aspirations: Being able to control and live peacefully with other people who possess special powers like Zunko.

Download Chugoku Usagi’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: デルタ＠きみがため (delta/Kimi ga Tame)
Demo Song: “ドキドキ☆フレンズ(Doki Doki☆Friends)”
Lyrics, Music, & Arrangement: マサキりたんP (MasakiritanP) of sweet little devil
Movie: wolf
Vocals: タイラ (Taira)
Guitar: マサキ (Masaki)
Bass: YU-TA

Oedo Chanko

Voice Provider: Maria Sashide

A second-year primary school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Head of the rival organization “Daitokai.” She looks childish, but is also very selfish.

Hobbies: Ordering other people around. Because of that, she was never able to attend school while growing up, and thus enjoys going to school now.
Abilities: Controlling and riding in her sumo robot, Genjimaru. She possesses the strongest ability out of all the characters who have made their debut in Zunda Horizon. Using the fan that she wears on her head, she’s also able to manipulate the actions of anyone whom she douses with her special salt.
Aspirations: Creating a world under “Daitokai” that is hospitable and accepting of those who possess special powers… or at least it was. Now, it’s just “having fun in school.”

Download Oedo Chanko’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: higeoex

Chubu Tsurugi

Voice Provider: Ayano Miura

A third-year high school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Zunko’s upperclassman, and General of the rival organization “Daitokai.”

Hobbies: Has a bit of a Lolita complex, and is strangely overprotective of her leader, Oedo Chanko. She’s also an impulsive collector of demonic swords, not to mention an idol otaku.
Abilities: The plate that she wears atop her head changes depending on her mood. She is very skilled with swords, being able to wield up to nine of them at once. She can also wield just one blade in hand and have the other eight float around her as she descends on her opponents.
Aspirations: Creating a world under “Daitokai” that is hospitable and accepting of those who possess special powers… or at least it was. Now, it’s just “making sure that Oedo Chanko grows up healthy.”

Download Chubu Tsurugi’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: Caparo Ulula

Kansai Shinobi

Voice Provider: Ayaka Imamura

A first-year high school student at Furusato Girls Academy. Zunko’s underclassman and co-worker at her part-time job, and also a scout for the rival organization “Daitokai.”

Hobbies: Restaurant-hopping. Her obsession with food is strong, and is firmly in the Kansai camp when it comes to udon. She’s also a fan of manzai.
Abilities: Able to draw from a number of various ninja arts, especially Kansai-style Ninjutsu. Quick battles are a common feat for her.
Aspirations: Creating a world under “Daitokai” that is hospitable and accepting of those who possess special powers… or at least it was. Now, it’s just “having fun playing with Oedo Chanko and the gang.”

Download Kansai Shinobi’s UTAU voice bank here.

UTAU Sound Director: デルタ＠きみがため (delta/Kimi ga Tame)
Demo Song #1: “トリトメ (Toritome)”
Music: 爆破みかん (Bakuha Mikan)
Movie: *yuuka

Demo Song #2: “テトテンシャン (Tetotension)”
Lyrics, Music, & Arrangement: タイラ (Taira) of sweet little devil
Movie: wolf
Vocals: タイラ (Taira)
Guitar: マサキ (Masaki)
Bass: YU-TA

And for those who still have yet to watch the first-ever anime voice synth musical, check it out now!

Official Links

Character Voice Download Page
Zunda Horizon Crowdfunding Page

The post UTAU Voice Banks for “Zunda Horizon” Characters Released! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Zunda Horizon” Crowdfunding Campaign
item.dc:creator: Cowfee
item.description:
While the newest animated addition to the VOCALOID universe is proving to be a hit, Zunda Horizon‘s producers have a vision to take it a step (or several steps) further with their crowdfunding campaign! By upgrading equipment, improving production, and tons more, Tohoku Zunko and the Horizon cast need your help to ensure that the …

The post “Zunda Horizon” Crowdfunding Campaign appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
While the newest animated addition to the VOCALOID universe is proving to be a hit, Zunda Horizon‘s producers have a vision to take it a step (or several steps) further with their crowdfunding campaign! By upgrading equipment, improving production, and tons more, Tohoku Zunko and the Horizon cast need your help to ensure that the project reaches its greatest potential it deserves!

What is Zunda Horizon?

Zunda Horizon is a 30-minute animation produced as a joint effort between Wao! World, Studio Live, and Zunko’s promotional company SSS LLC. Part of a four-series lineup of the “Anime Tamago 2017” project, it is the first musical animation that incorporates singing synthesis software, such as VOCALOID and UTAU. The AHS VOCALOID and Zunda Horizon‘s main character, Tohoku Zunko, sings using her VOCALOID software, while the rest of the cast sing using UTAU.

If you haven’t seen Zunda Horizon yet, there are official videos available on YouTube and niconico. However, be quick! They will only be up for a month.

If you liked what you saw, head on over to the campaign site and start donating! Of course, supporting the project will come with its perks.

Crowdfunding Goals

1st Goal: ¥8,000,000 JPY

Upgrade from 2ch Stereo to 5.1 surround sound.

2nd Goal: ¥12,000,000 JPY

Movie screening in Miyagi Prefecture and additional end roll pictures.

3rd Goal: ¥15,000,000 JPY

Addition of a “Warning” segment (e.g. requesting audience members to silence their cellphones) before the movie begins.

4th Goal: ¥20,000,000 JPY

Creation of scripts, storyboards, and character image sketches for the anime sequel. All of them will be distributed to all ¥5,000 JPY and above backers.

5th Goal: ¥35,000,000 JPY

Creation of the anime sequel.

In addition, the original animation sketches will be sent to Tohoku Region organizations upon the project’s conclusion (this is to encourage anime enthusiasts to travel to Tohoku and catch a glimpse of the creative production process)!

The eleven cast characters’ UTAU voice banks will also be released to the public for free use.

Crowdfunding Routes & Rewards

For General Supporters

Those who donate ¥30,000 JPY or more will be given the copies of the original animation sketches. Those who donate ¥100,000 JPY or more will receive a *cut bag of all the materials used in the animation.

T/N: A “cut bag” is a bag (typically a file folder) that animators use to store storyboards, time-sheets, and still or transitional sketches.

¥500 JPY: The “Concept Art Revealed” Route

Those who take this route will receive downloads of the anime’s concept art.

¥5,000 JPY: The “Gonna Watch the Anime!” Route

Those who take this route will receive…

  • Digital download of the current version of Zunda Horizon
  • Digital download of the 5.1 surround sound version of Zunda Horizon
  • Digital download of the script and storyboard
  • Digital download of the anime’s concept art

¥30,000 JPY: “Getting Special Zunda Horizon Creation Material” Route

Those who take this route will receive…

  • Animation sketches
  • Zunda Horizon on Blu-ray
  • Their names shown in the end-roll credits
  • Everything in the “Gonna Watch the Anime!” route

¥50,000 JPY: “Director Autographed Blu-ray” Route

Those who take this route will receive…

  • Zunda Horizon on Blu-ray, autographed by the director
  • Everything in the “Getting Special Zunda Horizon Creation Material” route

¥100,000 JPY: “Getting LOTSA Special Zunda Horizon Creation Material” Route

Those who take this route will receive…

  • Two cuts of ALL of the creation material (everything included in the *cut bag) used when creating the anime
  • Everything in the “Getting Special Zunda Horizon Creation Material” route

¥300,000 JPY: “Behind the Scenes Tour of Zunda Horizon” Route

Those who take this route will receive…

  • A tour of WAO Studios, and the privilege of participating in director and producer meetings
  • Everything in the “Getting LOTSA Special Zunda Horizon Creation Material” route

¥1,000,000 JPY: “Getting Hand Drawn End Card Illustrations” Route

Those who take this route will receive…

  • A framed picture of all the end card illustrations, hand-drawn by the director of animation and character design, Risa Suzuki
  • Everything in the “Behind the Scenes Tour of Zunda Horizon” route

*¥30,000 JPY: Special “How to Get Zunda Horizon Digital Content” Route

  • Digital downloads of Zunda Horizon‘s transitional animation sketches, both in greyscale and color (14,000 frames each for a total of 28,000 frames)
  • Digital downloads of Zunda Horizon still sketches

Note: These sketches are useful for machine learning, studying how to draw anime, or just looking at for fun. As long as they are not used for commercial purposes, you are free to use these sketches, rarely seen by the public, however you’d like.

The crowdfunding campaign will end on June 12th at 23:59 JST. Until that time, let’s continue to support Zunko and her friends’ endeavors in the hopeful sequel!

Note: At the time of writing this article, the project is already currently 71% completed in reaching its target amount of ¥8,000,000 JPY.

If you would like more information on the anime or wish to contribute to the campaign, check out the official links below.

Official Links

Zunda Horizon‘s Website
Zunda Horizon Crowdfunding Page

The post “Zunda Horizon” Crowdfunding Campaign appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Miku Sings Studio Ghibli Songs in “Ghibli wo Utau!”
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Studio Ghibli and Miku fans unite! We now have a crossover that’s a must-have for both! Ghibli wo utau by The Retrievers feat. Hatsune Miku features Miku singing eight hits from popular Ghibli movies! About the Album This 8 track album features songs that every Ghibli fan knows but with a twist: Miku sings them …

The post Miku Sings Studio Ghibli Songs in “Ghibli wo Utau!” appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Studio Ghibli and Miku fans unite! We now have a crossover that’s a must-have for both! Ghibli wo utau by The Retrievers feat. Hatsune Miku features Miku singing eight hits from popular Ghibli movies!

About the Album

This 8 track album features songs that every Ghibli fan knows but with a twist: Miku sings them and they all feature awesome rock-style instrumentals by The Retrievers! Of course, we can’t forget who handled Miku’s vocals: the famous producer, HarryP!

The beautiful jacket illustration is by Agonasubi.

Crossfade

If YouTube doesn’t work for you, check out the NND upload here.

Tracklist

01. “Ponyo on The Cliff by The Sea” (Ponyo)
02. “My Neighbor Totoro” (My Neighbor Totoro)
03. “Carrying You” (Laputa – Castle in The Sky)
04. “Breakfast Song” (From Up on Poppy Hill)
05. “Itsumo Nandodemo” (Spirited Away)
06. “Megurukisetsu” (Kiki’s Delivery Service)
07. “Mononoke Hime” (Princess Mononoke)
08. “Sanpo” (My Neighbor Totoro)

Where to Order & Bonuses

Depending on where you order, you may receive a pre-order bonus! Please note that not all of these websites ship internationally.

  • CDJapan ¥1,852  JPY ($17.05 USD) [No Bonus]
  • Animate International / Animate Japan ¥1,852 JPY before tax (about $17.05 USD) [Original Illustration Card w/ SS]
  • Amazon Japan ¥2,000 JPY (about $18.41 USD) [No Bonus]
  • HMV ¥2,000 JPY [Instrumental CD]
  • Tower Records ¥2,000 JPY [Paper Bookmark]

Be sure to pre-order the album while you can! It’s set to release on April 26th.

The post Miku Sings Studio Ghibli Songs in “Ghibli wo Utau!” appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Miku Sings the Ending Theme to “Aware! Meisaku-kun”
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
The popular NHK kids anime series Aware! Meisaku-kun has recently begun its second season, and with it comes a brand-new ending song entitled “名作！傑作！マスターピース！ (Meisaku! Kessaku! Masterpiece!).” What might entice VOCALOID fans of all ages to start or continue watching the series is the fact that its new theme song is sung by none other than Hatsune …

The post Miku Sings the Ending Theme to “Aware! Meisaku-kun” appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The popular NHK kids anime series Aware! Meisaku-kun has recently begun its second season, and with it comes a brand-new ending song entitled “名作！傑作！マスターピース！ (Meisaku! Kessaku! Masterpiece!).” What might entice VOCALOID fans of all ages to start or continue watching the series is the fact that its new theme song is sung by none other than Hatsune Miku!

Music for the song was written by kz, while the lyrics were handled by HachiojiP. It is, in fact, the first song that this pair of titans in the VOCALOID world have collaborated on ever since creating the very popular “Weekender Girl” together. If the creators of the anime were aiming to indoctrinate young children on the wonders of Miku’s voice, then they sure played their cards right!

Below are some official announcements for the song’s debut!

【情報解禁】「あはれ！名作くん」新EDは作曲・kzさん（@kz_lt）、作詞・八王子Pさん（@8_Prince）の新曲「名作！傑作！マスターピース！」に決定！ボカロ界の大物の曲を初音ミクが歌います！今日18時20分「ビットワールド」内で世界初公開！聴くべし！ #名作くん pic.twitter.com/Sa1XvBA1JL

— むすび（あはれ！名作くん 公式） (@aware_meisaku) April 7, 2017

“Aware! Meisaku-kun’s new ending theme will be the latest song by kz (@kz_lt) and HachiojiP (@8_Prince), ‘Meisaku! Kessaku! Masterpiece!’ These superstars of the VOCALOID world will also have Hatsune Miku singing their song! Tune in to BITWORLD tonight at 6:20 PM to catch its must-hear world premier!” #名作くん

本日よりEテレの番組「あはれ！名作くん」の新EDを八王子とともにつとめさせていただきます。楽しいやつ作りました。何卒シクヨロです。 https://t.co/XvQRosyiPe

— kz (@kz_lt) April 7, 2017

“I was given the honor of working with HachiojiP on the new ending theme for the ETV series, Aware! Meisaku-kun, which starts airing today. It was really fun to work on. I hope you all enjoy.”

【お知らせ】EDテレで放送中のアニメ「あはれ！名作くん」第２シーズンの主題歌を担当させて頂きました！Weekender Girl以来のkz大先生との合作です！なんとボーカルは初音ミク。ぜひアニメご覧下さいー！ #名作くん https://t.co/LVxRWVJbMf pic.twitter.com/IP3ECUNWAT

— 八王子P (@8_Prince) April 7, 2017

“I was in charge of creating the new ending song for season 2 of the anime Aware! Meisaku-kun, now airing on ETV! It was my first collaborative project with kz-sensei since Weekender Girl! And, of course, the vocals will be handled by Miku. Be sure to tune in and watch it!” #名作くん
http://meisakukun.com/

About Aware! Meisaku-kun

Aware! Meisaku-kun is an anime series from Pie in the Sky and began airing on April 8th, 2016, as part of the BITWORLD program on NHK Educational TV, also known as ETV. It follows the everyday (mis)adventures of sixth-grader, Meisaku Matsuda, and his friends at Ryugu Elementary School: Sweets, the peach-shaped hat-wearing kid; Musubi, the talking rice ball; Nocchio, the puppet (er, make that ROBOT) boy; and Bolt, the muscular turtle. Their school has a reputation for churning out well-known characters in famous fables, which Meisaku and his classmates seek to become as well.

Lyrics for “Meisaku! Kessaku! Masterpiece!” go as so:

DA・DA・DA　大冒険     DA・DA・DA　大惨事
Da-da-da daibouken     Da-da-da daisanji

DA・DA・DA　大失敗     大体問題ない！
Da-da-da daishippai     Daitai mondai nai!

古今から東西まで     語り継がれるよ　物語
Kokon kara touzai made     Katari tsugareru yo, monogatari

あはれ！あはれる！あはれなり！     千里の道も一歩ずつ
Aware! Awareru! Awarenari!     Senri no michi mo ippo zutsu

名作！傑作！いとをかし     笑う門にはね福が来る
Meisaku! Kessaku! Ito wo kashi     Warau kado ni wa ne fuku ga kuru

王様だって妖精だって     先生だってなんだって
Ousama datte yousei datte     Sensei datte nan datte

みんなでなかよくせーので     じゃんけんぽん
Minna de naka yoku seii no de     Jankenpon

 

Aware! Meisaku-kun‘s Official Twitter

kz’s Official Twitter

HachiojiP’s Official Twitter

The post Miku Sings the Ending Theme to “Aware! Meisaku-kun” appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Production of “Zunda Horizon” Now Complete!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
Tohoku Zunko fans will be happy to know that production of Zunda Horizon is now complete, as announced by AHS in a special live stream! You can check out more (brief) footage of it here! To celebrate another successful year of anime creation, special screenings of Zunda Horizon and other Anime Tamago productions will take …

The post Production of “Zunda Horizon” Now Complete! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Tohoku Zunko fans will be happy to know that production of Zunda Horizon is now complete, as announced by AHS in a special live stream! You can check out more (brief) footage of it here!

To celebrate another successful year of anime creation, special screenings of Zunda Horizon and other Anime Tamago productions will take place at the Ikebukuro HUMAX Cinema on March 11, 2017. The event will be emceed by famous voice actor Takayuki Kondo and voice actress Mie Sonozaki, who will be talking with the young talent behind the Anime Tamago Project, and celebrating their accomplishments thus far.

150 lucky registrants to the event will be selected by lottery to attend for free! (Registration closed on February 24th.) Even AHS President and CEO, Tomohide Ogata, admits that he has never seen the anime before, so it’ll be a screening event that everyone in attendance can look forward to watching!

Those who cannot catch the airing on March 11th (or those who would like to catch it again) will get another chance at special late night screenings at Theater Shinjuku from April 22nd through the 28th! Information on these screenings are as follows:

Dates: April 22nd (Saturday) ~ April 28th (Friday)
Start times: 8:50 pm on each night
Regular ticket price: ￥1,100 JPY (about $11 USD)
On Wednesday, April 26th: ￥1,000 JPY (about $10 USD)
For repeat customers: ￥1,000 JPY (about $10 USD) when you present a ticket stub

Anyone who attends these showings will even get a free pamphlet to boot!

About the Anime Tamago Project


The Anime Tamago Project is the work of a multi-studio coalition that started out as the “Young Animators’ Training Project” after receiving the blessings of the Japanese Agency for Cultural Affairs. As the name implies, their goal is to recruit and rear young and novice animators, providing them with on-the-job-training to get them ready for future careers in the cutthroat anime industry in Japan. The word “tamago” (meaning “egg” ) was chosen in 2015 to give the impression that their recruits are being “incubated” and lovingly cared-for under their guidance, and that someday they will break out of their shells and be “born” as full-fledged, fully-matured animators who are ready to start their new lives.

About Zunda Horizon


Now in their seventh year of operation, Anime Tamago participants have consistently churned out creative and successful anime that anybody can enjoy. Their four-series 2017 lineup includes Zunda Horizon, created as a joint effort between edutainment company Wao! World, animation company Studio Live, and Zunko’s promotional company SSS LLC. It’s an anime that dives headlong into the world of VOCALOID and voice synth fandom at a level that has never before been attempted by any anime studio, let alone a group of trainees. The special screening event on March 11th is not only an introduction to their works, but also a celebration of growth for this team of young talent who were given the chance to create something truly special, and will set the stage for the team’s next anime projects over the next year.

You can visit Anime Tamago’s official website, as well as follow them on Facebook and Twitter. You can also keep up-to-date on Zunda Horizon by visiting its official site, following Touhoku Zunko’s official Twitter account, and staying tuned to VNN! If this is your first time hearing about the anime, then check out our previous coverage below!

Tohoku Zunko Will Be Made into an Anime!
Tohoku Zunko V4 and Kiritan VOICEROID+ Announced Plus Anime Updates!
Tohoku Zunko Anime Update: All Character Visuals Revealed!
Anime Tamago PV Shows First Glimpses of Tohoku Zunko Anime “Zunda Horizon”

The post Production of “Zunda Horizon” Now Complete! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Anime Tamago PV Shows First Glimpses of Tohoku Zunko Anime “Zunda Horizon”
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Anime Tamago released a PV featuring their upcoming anime for this season! Fans who have been following know we announced earlier that the characters have been revealed and that the anime is set to air on March 11th. The latest Anime Tamago PV, however, gave us even more! We have the first glimpses of the …

The post Anime Tamago PV Shows First Glimpses of Tohoku Zunko Anime “Zunda Horizon” appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Anime Tamago released a PV featuring their upcoming anime for this season! Fans who have been following know we announced earlier that the characters have been revealed and that the anime is set to air on March 11th. The latest Anime Tamago PV, however, gave us even more! We have the first glimpses of the Tohoku Zunko anime Zunda Horizon!

The Video

While the preview of Zunda Horizon is a bit short, it definitely helps to build the hype. Now we not only know the style of the anime’s designs, but also the style of the animation as well! Even the short preview looks incredible and it’s getting fans really excited.

The video features all three of the Tohoku sisters (Kiritan, Itako, and Zunko) as well as one of the villains, Ooedo Chanko.

Cast List

The voice actors for the anime have also been revealed! The Tohoku sisters will, of course, be voiced by their voice providers.

Tohoku Zunko:
佐藤　聡美 (Satou Satomi)

Tohoku Kiritan:
茜屋　日海夏 (Akaneya Himika)

Tohoku Itako:
木戸　衣吹 (Kido Ibuki)

Chuugoku Usagi:
桃河　りか (Momokawa Rika)

Shikoku Metan:
田中　小雪 (Tanaka Koyuki)

Kyuushuu Sora:
西田　望見 (Nishida Nozomi)

Ooedo Chanko:
指出　毬亜 (Sashide Maria)

Chuubu Tsurugi:
濱口　綾乃 (Hamaguchi Ayano)

Kansai Shinobi:
今村　彩夏 (Imamura Ayaka)

Okinawa Awamo:
古賀　葵 (Koga Aoi)

Hokkaido Meron:
清水　彩香 (Shimizu Ayaka)

Zundamon:
伊藤　ゆいな (Itou Yuina)

More Information

There’s a little less than a month to go before the release of Zunda Horizon! If you haven’t heard of this anime yet, feel free to check out the links below for more information.

Character Visuals Reveal
Initial Reveal and Plot

Stay tuned to VNN for any more updates that may surface!

The post Anime Tamago PV Shows First Glimpses of Tohoku Zunko Anime “Zunda Horizon” appeared first on VNN.
